title: China Sees Record Coal Plant Bids Even as Usage Declines, Report Finds
description: China fielded a record number of proposals for new coal-fired power plants last year — even as generation from fossil fuels fell amid a surge of clean energy.
content: China fielded a record number of proposals for new coal-fired power plants last year — even as generation from fossil fuels fell amid a surge of clean energy.
